title: Docker & Kubernetes: The Practical Guide [2022 Edition]
details: Join this bestselling Docker & Kubernetes course and learn two of the most important development technologies from the ground up, in great detail! Especially in web development (though not limited to that), Docker can really take you to the next level!

title: NodeJS - The Complete Guide (MVC, REST APIs, GraphQL, Deno)
details: Join the most comprehensive Node.js course on Udemy and learn Node in both a practical as well as theory-based way! This course was updated to also include sections on Deno.js - in addition to more than 30 hours of content on Node.js! Node.js is probably THE most popular and modern server-side programming language you can dive into these days! Node.js developers are in high demand and the language is used for everything from traditional web apps with server-side rendered views over REST APIs all the way up to GraphQL APIs and real-time web services. Not to mention its applications in build workflows for projects of all sizes.

title: The Complete React Native + Hooks Course
